name: Loooop (Dabu_10, RainiZou, redrums)
description:
Loooop is an animation-beat game.

You need to Pick up the Sound Card and Put it Down on the Track

The sound card would Unfold into Animations.

There are 3 Targets to achieve in the upper left. Every time the animations combine in the right order, the corresponding icon will be lit up.

Left Click to pick up and Release to drop Drag the start from the bottom to the track to start

There is only one level due to the time limitation. There are 5 more levels in development.

Please do not enter the full screen or there will be some bugs in determining accuracy. The default resolution is 1920*1080.

Enjoy the sound!

Design & Code: Dabu

Art: Raini, Bowen

Sound: Rosylia

Special Thanks to Kanon
